import React from 'react' import './Updates.css' import {UilNewspaper, UilStopCircle} from "@iconscout/react-unicons" import useNewApi from './useNewApi'; import Truncate from 'react-truncate'; const Updates = () => { const {data} = useNewApi(); console.log(data) // const data = false; const updateData = data ? : function NewsContent() { const articleSource = !data ? "loading..." : data.articles[0].source.name const articleImg = !data ? "loading" : data.articles[0].urlToImage const articleTitle = !data ? "loading..." : data.articles[0].title const articleDescription = !data ? "loading..." : data.articles[0].content const articleLink = !data ? "#" : data.articles[0].url const articleAuthor = !data ? "--Website--" : data.articles[0].author const namedAuthor = articleAuthor ? articleAuthor : ar return (
Top news
{articleSource}
{articleTitle}
Author {articleAuthor}
...} className='news--description' > {articleDescription}
Read more...
3 mins ago
) } return ( <> {updateData} ); } export default Updates function ErrorContent() { return (
Error loading news Network Error...
) }
